docs.text: If you want to follow the meaningful changes of this site, you can either: Subscribe to the RSS feed Browse the Newsletter section RSS feed ⚑ You can choose how often you want to see the site updates: Daily Weekly Monthly Yearly Newsletter section ⚑ We aggregate the changes by year, month, week and day. You can navigate this section to see the latest changes. Credits ⚑ The newsletters and the RSS feeds are automatically created from the message commits of the repository thanks to the mkdocs-newsletter plugin.
